product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: Geared towards small and medium-size riders, this high-performance paddleboard offers excellent glide, making it a great choice for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising and recreational racing.
short_description: Geared towards small and medium-size riders, this high-performance paddleboard offers excellent glide, making it a great choice for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising and recreational racing.
